5 IFPEEK(44)=17THEN10
6 PRINT"(CLR)(DOWN)(DOWN)DIGITARE POKE44,17:POK(DOWN)E4352,0:NEW":PRINT"(DOWN)E RILEGGERE IL PROGRAMMA":
END
10 FORI=4096TO4209:READK:POKEI,K:NEXT:END
20 DATA0,15,16,1,0,151,52,51,44,49,49,50,58,138,0,0,0,120,169,35,141,20,3,169,16,141
30 DATA21,3,88,169,15,141,14,144,96,169,64,197,197,208,18,169,0,205,164,2,240,8,206
40 DATA164,2,208,3,32,96,16,76,191,234,174,161,2,173,162,2,157,9,144,173,163,2,141,164
50 DATA2,76,191,234,120,169,191,141,20,3,169,234,141,21,3,88,32,96,16,141,14,144,96
60 DATA169,0,141,10,144,141,11,144,141,12,144,141,13,144,96,0,0,0
